item.title: Hosting a website on AWS using S3 and Route 53
item.description: After purchasing a domain, comes the dilema of finding a good place to host it. Same was the case with my domain http://mayankrajoria.com. Since this is my personal website, I decided it would essentially be a static one. Now for such websites, AWS S3 is pretty much the cheapest and most reliable way of hosting. The S3 service provided by Amazon gives you “buckets”, into which you can store files. We make use of the fact that these files can then be served to the internet easily. So here are the steps for getting you started with S3 hosting for your own static website.
